short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Easter Coloring Book is a fun and free game right on your gadget. Install now

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Easter Coloring Book is a relatively interesting game, with simple and easy to understand gameplay. By installing the game as a utility, select an icon you want to decorate and proceed to decorate such as coloring, erasing and being able to save that picture.
